column4: I've given up attempting to become a programmer; I have enough trouble figuring out the formation of the Linux filesystems
Oh.... any explanations on installing w32codec?
I'm having the worst of tribulations
Anybody able to assist me with the installation of w32codecs?
I know it's pathetic and there are online intructions but I've failed repetitiously
although, i did finally manage to install wine
you have the .deb package down loaded  ?
sudo dpkg -i path/to/packagename.deb     it's that simple    iirc.

err i think there was also a script in either that package or the one for dvds    i dont  remember which.  but you had to do something like  sudo sh /usr/lib/something/script.sh       to finish the install but that should be in the instructions if it's the codecs.
if no one pipes up with the answer   you can always     dpkg -L <packagename> | grep .sh     and see if it had a script in it  :)
sorry about the misscue,  was w32codecs that held the url
yeah  i said  /msg ubotu codecs  it was   /msg ubotu w32codecs    sorry.
give me a minute let me find it for you.
